title: Drawing, Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) Design for Decorated Paper: Green ZigZag Pattern (fragment), early 20th century
title_raw: Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) Design for Decorated Paper: Green ZigZag Pattern (fragment)
medium: brush and green watercolor (gouache?) on off-white coated wove paper
markings: On verso, above inscription, Wiener Werkstatte stamp (in purple in) reads: Retriebegesellschaft m.b.H./ der WIENER WERKSTATTE/ produktiv. Genossenschaft / fur Gegenstande des Kunstgewerbes/Kunstler-Werkstatte
inscribed: On verso, inscribed in graphite, just below center: M1.50 / [??]  InVeras Zwimmer [?? hard to read, possibly Werner....??] / KW 1170; lower right corner: 1165 [above] (3) [with horizontal line between them]
dimensions: 17.9 x 11.1 cm (7 1/16 x 4 3/8 in. ) at widest points; uneven sheet
description: Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) design for decorated paper:  green undulating zigzag lines, placed diagonally on sheet, which is a small fragment of larger sheet.  Most of the top right corner is  torn off, leaving jagged edges.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) Design for Decorated Paper: Green ZigZag Pattern (fragment), early 20th century. brush and green watercolor (gouache?) on off-white coated wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen. 1999-6-12.
